target.description: The target object that triggers the scroll, supports passing in selectors or DOM elements, and defaults to the nearest parent scrolling container
target.description_zh: 触发滚动的目标对象，支持传入选择器或 DOM 元素，默认最近的父级滚动容器

right.description: The distance from the right side of the page, the default unit is px
right.description_zh: 距离页面右侧的距离，默认单位为 px

bottom.description: The distance from the bottom of the page, the default unit is px
bottom.description_zh: 距离页面底部的距离，默认单位为 px

offset.description: The component is displayed when the scroll height reaches this parameter value
offset.description_zh: 滚动高度达到此参数值时才显示组件

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

immediate.description: Whether to scroll to the top instantly

z-index.description: Sets the z-index level of the component
z-index.description_zh: 设置组件的 z-index 层级

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a component is clicked
